name: Watch Party Platform V2
description: Real-time collaborative video watching platform with synchronized playback, chat functionality, and room management. Built with modern web technologies for seamless streaming experience.

name: Quick Chat V2
description: Fast and responsive real-time chat application with modern UI/UX, message encryption, and multi-platform support. Enhanced version with better performance and features.

name: AWS SES Mailbox SaaS
description: Scalable email management SaaS platform using AWS services. Features include email handling, storage, and delivery using AWS SES, S3, and Lambda functions for serverless architecture.

name: ALX Interview - Log Parsing
description: Real-time log parser built with Python for processing and analyzing log data efficiently. Implements regex patterns and data processing algorithms for extracting meaningful insights.

name: Simple Shell
description: Custom Unix shell implementation in C with process management, command execution, and built-in commands. A complete command-line interpreter following Unix principles.

name: Monty ByteCode Interpreter
description: Stack-based interpreter for Monty ByteCode files. Implements stack and queue data structures with various operations for bytecode execution and manipulation.

name: My Portfolio
description: Personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience. Built with modern web technologies featuring responsive design, smooth animations, and cosmic theme.

name: AirBnB Clone
description: Full-stack clone of AirBnB with property listings, booking system, user authentication, and review functionality. Comprehensive web application demonstrating full-stack development skills.

name: Printf Implementation
description: Custom implementation of the printf function in C, handling various format specifiers and edge cases. Deep dive into variadic functions and formatted output.

name: Binary Trees
description: Comprehensive implementation of binary tree data structures and algorithms including traversal methods, insertion, deletion, and various tree operations.

name: Sorting Algorithms
description: Implementation and analysis of various sorting algorithms including bubble sort, insertion sort, selection sort, quick sort, and merge sort with time complexity analysis.

name: Low-Level Programming
description: Collection of low-level programming projects and exercises covering pointers, memory allocation, file I/O, and systems programming concepts in C.
